mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REQUEST (userid, requeststate, requestid, tag, content, category, count, recontent, createtime) VALUES(#{userid}, #{requeststate}, #{requestid}, #{tag}, #{content}, #{category}, REQUEST_COUNT_SEQ.nextval, null, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REQUEST WHERE userid=#{userid} AND requestid=#{requestid} order by count asc
